He was born on August 31, 1945 in [[Porto]], [[Portugal]], and is one of the most influential popular musicians in Portugal. He's often considered the greatest name of the Portuguese popular music, after [[Zeca Afonso]], even if their music styles are quite different, and SÃ©rgio Godinho songs are often more of an urban style.
